name: The Cosy Room
description:
You have entered a large, cosy living room.  There is a fireplace
with a fire burning, and a few comfortable chairs around a little
table.  There is a door to the west, and also an exit to the east.

exits.description: The door is large, and made out of oak.
exits.keywords: door large oak~ 1 15014 15049 E fire fireplace~ The fire is built out of logs, and seems to be able to burn for  quite a while longer.

extra_descriptions.description: The chairs are arranged around the fireplace.
